titles.title: Electing a Member to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives:.
Electing a Member to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives:.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

bill.summary: Elects specified Members to the House Committees on: (1) Oversight and Government Reform; and (2) Science, Space, and Technology.
